property.name: text
property.value: Authors: Shuhei Emoto, Mai Kimura, Ilge Akkaya

property.name: text
property.value:
The distributed version of :
Each robot runs a particle filter on board with the measurement set obtained from the robot team at time t. Then, utilizing a black-box optimizer, it computes its optimal location at (t+1) that would minimize the uncertainty in the intruder estimate. The cost function that is maximized for this purpose is the approximate mutual information between the future measurement of the robot, and the future particle set that estimates the posterior intruder position density.

entity.name: Gaussian
entity.doc: Create a sequence of gaussian random variables

entity.name: IterateOverArray
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!

entity.name: OrderMeasurements
entity.doc: Iterate a contained actor over input arrays

svg.text: Make sure there is a director here!

entity.name: CompositeOptimizer
entity.doc: Optimize the objective function provided in the inside composite, subject to constraints and precision/iteration limits

svg.text: Provide a model that computes f(x) from x where f(x) is the term to be minimized. Also provide a model to compute g(x) from x, where the constraints on the minimization are g(x) >= 0.

property.name: legend
property.value: intruder, robot1, robot2, robot3, robot4, estimated intruder position
